attributes.action: Reform the House of Lords by restricting its membership to those Members of the House of Commons who have been elected at least twice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any twice-elected MP should be able to ascend to the Lords at a time of their choosing.

The review of legislation will be performed by experienced legislators.

Disposition of seats in the Lords will not be under the control or influence of the Government or Monarchy.

This will reduce the burden of electing members of the Lords, while restricting membership to those proven to be electable.
